analysis.description:
PotPotato._endContestIfNeeded (/unique_chucks/6/0x96978ba07d6476a47a3f69c8ddebae8dcb16edbd.sol#94-110) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- hotPotatoHolder.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/6/0x96978ba07d6476a47a3f69c8ddebae8dcb16edbd.sol#102-103)

PotPotato.timePassed (/unique_chucks/6/0x96978ba07d6476a47a3f69c8ddebae8dcb16edbd.sol#74-80) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lastBidTime == 0

PotPotato.buyPotato (/unique_chucks/6/0x96978ba07d6476a47a3f69c8ddebae8dcb16edbd.sol#40-70) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > contestStartTime) (/unique_chucks/6/0x96978ba07d6476a47a3f69c8ddebae8dcb16edbd.sol#41-44)

PotPotato.timePassed (/unique_chucks/6/0x96978ba07d6476a47a3f69c8ddebae8dcb16edbd.sol#74-80) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- lastBidTime == 0 (/unique_chucks/6/0x96978ba07d6476a47a3f69c8ddebae8dcb16edbd.sol#77-79)

PotPotato.timeLeftToContestStart (/unique_chucks/6/0x96978ba07d6476a47a3f69c8ddebae8dcb16edbd.sol#80-86) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > contestStartTime (/unique_chucks/6/0x96978ba07d6476a47a3f69c8ddebae8dcb16edbd.sol#83-85)

PotPotato._setNewStartTime (/unique_chucks/6/0x96978ba07d6476a47a3f69c8ddebae8dcb16edbd.sol#116-127) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- start < block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/6/0x96978ba07d6476a47a3f69c8ddebae8dcb16edbd.sol#119-125)

PotPotato.BASE_TIME_TO_COOK should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x96978ba07d6476a47a3f69c8ddebae8dcb16edbd.sol#15)
PotPotato.CONTEST_INTERVAL should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x96978ba07d6476a47a3f69c8ddebae8dcb16edbd.sol#20)
PotPotato.NUM_POTATOES should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x96978ba07d6476a47a3f69c8ddebae8dcb16edbd.sol#18-19)
PotPotato.START_PRICE should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x96978ba07d6476a47a3f69c8ddebae8dcb16edbd.sol#19-20)
PotPotato.TIME_MULTIPLIER should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x96978ba07d6476a47a3f69c8ddebae8dcb16edbd.sol#16)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/6/0x96978ba07d6476a47a3f69c8ddebae8dcb16edbd.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/6/0x96978ba07d6476a47a3f69c8ddebae8dcb16edbd.sol#1): it allows old versions
